name: Vs Blue Ch4
description:
the 4th installment to the blue mod "franchise" where blue is a hitman hired by daddy dearest to kill you however you beat him and then he goes to train where you bother him some more and then get trained by him now you have gone to the mall with him to celebrate a successful training session when you are approached by an odd character

This mod Includes:

  • an original soundtrack
  • original characters
  • way to many cameos
  • original sprites
  • original original (with a side of original [did I mention original?])

OST
